dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6564 IH: Farm Credit Adjustment Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Spanberger (for herself and Mr. LaMalfa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To allow the Farm Credit Administration the option to examine low-risk Farm Credit System institutions under a 24-month cycle.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Farm Credit Adjustment Act.

section.header: Farm Credit Administration option to examine low risk Farm Credit System institutions on a 24-month cycle

subsection.text: Section 5.19(a) of the Farm Credit Act of 1971 (12 U.S.C. 2254(a)) is amended in the 1st sentenceâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking in no event and inserting not; and

by inserting , except that the Farm Credit Administration, in its sole discretion, may extend the time period between mandatory examinations of institutions deemed by the Farm Credit Administration to be low-risk institutions to not more than 24 months before the period.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall take effect on October 1, 2024.
